title: Is it permissible to lick our lips while fasting? - assim al hakeem
transcript: so check I had a question regarding like when we are fasting and if my lips are dry is it okay to deposit a bit of saliva on the lips just to wet it like I have doubts like when I do hudu I like the water is there on my lips so I need to bite it completely and I keep my lips dry like the whole day so what should I do there is no problem in licking your lips if they're dry and having some saliva on it this is totally permissible and it has no impact on your fasting
